sys_template.name: Branch - INET Setup
sys_template.template:
short_description=Requires INET location setting up^instructions=This template is to be used for all instances where the user requires help setting INET address on Wintegrate to enable quotes to excel or reports to disk functions. Therefore the CI should either be SFT-BRARPTS-RPN or SFT-QUOTES-RPN, the System will be either Branch or Wolcen and then it's corresponding Service.
KM30501 covers info for this process and should be the linked document. There is no relevant problem record and no data edit is required.^affected_system=^cmdb_ci=^close_notes=^contact_type=phone^impact=3^category=^subcategory=^close_code=
